name: I live between Covent Garden, Sheffield, Newcastle, & Germany

content.html: A "Sainsbury's copywriter is having a bad day" story has done the rounds (image 1, 2, 3), but... ... the same text was on the Tesco site (image 4). I suspect that likely means this was the actual info from the company (who are well known for their *terrible* copywriting jokes)
content.value:
A "Sainsbury's copywriter is having a bad day" story has done the rounds (image 1, 2, 3), but...

... the same text was on the Tesco site (image 4).

I suspect that likely means this was the actual info from the company (who are well known for their *terrible* copywriting jokes)
